name: RunDistributedTests
description: Run tests distributedly using multiple test agents in a lab environment. This task is under Preview, please contact devops_tools@microsoft.com to enable this task fully on the backend for your account. Please refer http://aka.ms/ci_cd for additional guidance.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: environment
inputs.label: Test Environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the environment on which tests need to be run.

inputs.name: alternateCredsUserName
inputs.label: Alternate credentials Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Alternate Credentials Password, only required if connecting to Visual Studio Online

inputs.name: alternateCredsPassword
inputs.label: Alternate credentials Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Alternate Credentials Password, only required if connecting to Visual Studio Online

inputs.name: sourcefilters
inputs.label: Test Assembly
inputs.helpMarkDown: Test binaries to run tests on. Wildcards can be used. For example, `**\*test*.dll;` for all dlls containing 'test' in their name.

inputs.name: runSettingsFile
inputs.label: Run Settings File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to runsettings file to use with the tests. Use $(agent.BuildDirectory)\$(system.teamProject) to access the Project folder.
